name: Research Team
description: Data analysis and scientific research project team. Provides comprehensive workflow from research planning to publication, ensuring artifact quality and reproducibility. Core 9 roles are always active; optional 4 roles enable when needed.

members.description: Artifact Owner: Research Plan, Analysis Plan, Decision Log. Determines overall research direction with final approval authority on all deliverables. Manages resource allocation and prioritization. Defines research questions, hypotheses, success criteria, and documents all key decisions with rationale.

Artifact Owner: Data Acquisition Protocol, Raw Data Catalog. Creates reproducible data acquisition procedures and catalogs all raw data with metadata. Evaluates data source reliability and documents the complete acquisition process including access methods, licensing, and integrity verification.

Artifact Owner: Clean Dataset, Data Dictionary, Data Quality Report. Responsible for data cleaning, metadata management, and data integrity. Produces analysis-ready datasets with documented transformations, comprehensive variable definitions, and quality assessment reports.

Artifact Owner: EDA Report, Hypothesis List. Conducts exploratory data analysis to understand data characteristics and generate testable hypotheses. Visualizes distributions, correlations, outliers, and patterns. Proposes analysis directions based on empirical observations.

Artifact Owner: Statistical Analysis Note, Key Tables. Creates statistical analysis documentation with methodology, assumptions, results, and interpretations. Produces key statistical tables with test statistics, p-values, effect sizes, and confidence intervals. Validates analytical approach appropriateness.

Artifact Owner: Training Pipeline, Model Comparison Table. Builds reproducible training pipelines covering preprocessing, training, and evaluation. Creates comprehensive model comparison tables documenting architectures, hyperparameters, metrics, and computational costs. Implements and evaluates predictive models.

Artifact Owner: DL Experiment Log, Reproducibility Notebook. Manages deep learning experiments with tracked configurations, results, and model artifacts. Creates reproducibility notebooks with environment specifications, random seeds, and step-by-step reproduction procedures. Designs, trains, and evaluates neural network architectures.

Artifact Owner: Uncertainty Report, Pareto Front. Quantifies and reports uncertainty in conclusions including parameter, model, and data uncertainty. Identifies Pareto-optimal solutions for multi-objective problems. Applies Bayesian inference and optimization methods with documented trade-offs.

Artifact Owner: Figure Set, Regeneration Script. Creates publication-quality figures with consistent styling across all visualizations. Develops regeneration scripts that reproduce all figures from source data. Ensures model interpretability through explainability visualizations and technical quality of all visual outputs.

Artifact Owner: IMRAD Manuscript. Authors Introduction/Methods/Results/And/Discussion format manuscripts. Constructs coherent research narrative with appropriate academic expression. Manages logical flow, clarity, and citation integrity. Translates technical findings into publication-ready prose.

Artifact Owner: Related Work Map. Creates comprehensive maps of related research positioning the current study in the broader literature. Identifies knowledge gaps and research opportunities. Conducts systematic literature searches and synthesizes findings thematically with complete reference management.

Artifact Owner: Review Checklist. Conducts checklist-based peer review evaluating methodology validity, statistical appropriateness, result interpretation, and reproducibility. Issues quality assurance reports identifying issues with specific improvement recommendations prioritized by severity.

Artifact Owner: Presentation Slides/Poster. Creates effective presentation materials (slides or posters) communicating research findings. Optimizes visual communication with clear messaging, appropriate visual hierarchy, and audience-appropriate technical depth. Prepares Q&A support materials.

artifacts.name: Research Plan
artifacts.qualityCriteria: Clear purpose, hypotheses, success criteria, scope, risks documented

artifacts.name: Analysis Plan
artifacts.qualityCriteria: Data sources, methods, metrics, sample size specified

artifacts.name: Decision Log
artifacts.qualityCriteria: Chronological decisions with rationale and impact documented

artifacts.name: Data Acquisition Protocol
artifacts.qualityCriteria: Step-by-step procedures, metadata, access requirements, constraints complete

artifacts.name: Raw Data Catalog
artifacts.qualityCriteria: File paths, formats, sizes, hashes, timestamps recorded

artifacts.name: Clean Dataset
artifacts.qualityCriteria: Missing values and outliers handled with documented transformations

artifacts.name: Data Dictionary
artifacts.qualityCriteria: Variable names, types, meanings, valid ranges defined

artifacts.name: Data Quality Report
artifacts.qualityCriteria: Quality metrics, identified issues, applied treatments, remaining challenges documented

artifacts.name: EDA Report
artifacts.qualityCriteria: Distributions, correlations, outliers, patterns visualized with interpretations

artifacts.name: Hypothesis List
artifacts.qualityCriteria: Testable hypotheses with EDA evidence and proposed validation methods

artifacts.name: Statistical Analysis Note
artifacts.qualityCriteria: Methods, assumptions, results, interpretations complete with limitations noted

artifacts.name: Key Tables
artifacts.qualityCriteria: Statistics, p-values, effect sizes, confidence intervals for primary analyses

artifacts.name: Training Pipeline
artifacts.qualityCriteria: Reproducible preprocessing, training, evaluation code with dependency specification

artifacts.name: Model Comparison Table
artifacts.qualityCriteria: Models, hyperparameters, training/validation/test metrics, computational costs compared

artifacts.name: DL Experiment Log
artifacts.qualityCriteria: Experiment configs, results, model checkpoints tracked with queryable history

artifacts.name: Reproducibility Notebook
artifacts.qualityCriteria: Environment specs, random seeds, step-by-step reproduction with expected results

artifacts.name: Uncertainty Report
artifacts.qualityCriteria: Uncertainty sources quantified with confidence/credible intervals and sensitivity analysis

artifacts.name: Pareto Front
artifacts.qualityCriteria: Trade-offs visualized with recommended solutions and justification

artifacts.name: Figure Set
artifacts.qualityCriteria: Consistent style, publication resolution, complete captions

artifacts.name: Regeneration Script
artifacts.qualityCriteria: Single script regenerates all figures from source data

artifacts.name: IMRAD Manuscript
artifacts.qualityCriteria: Complete structure, logical coherence, appropriate citations

artifacts.name: Related Work Map
artifacts.qualityCriteria: Research positioning clear, knowledge gaps identified, complete references

artifacts.name: Review Checklist
artifacts.qualityCriteria: All items evaluated with specific improvement recommendations

artifacts.name: Presentation Slides/Poster
artifacts.qualityCriteria: Clear message, effective visuals, appropriate technical depth
